A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Biggest disappointment of 2017. I liked TFA although it was a rehash of EpIV. It was well timed\, made and very entertaining. TLJ was dull\, parody-like humor was ill placed\, story boring\, music lame\, set design (throne room) looked like a TV stage. Please blow it to hell and remake EpVIII (wo?t happen).
